description: Azure East -stunning corner townhome boasts the best location in the entire complex. Quiet private setting this 2630 sqft home features 3 levels of bright, luxurious living. Main floor offers 10ft ceilings hardwood floors & an open-concept layout with vaulted ceilings & cozy gas fireplace. The gourmet kitchen includes granite counters ss appliances & large island-perfect for entertaining. Upstairs the spacious primary suite features spa-inspired ensuite plus 2 additional bedrooms & loft area ideal for work or play. Fully finished basement includes a massive rec room & full bath -easily converting to a guest suite or 4th bedroom. Enjoy a fully fenced yard, side-by-side garage, and unbeatable walkability to Morgan Crossing Southridge School dining shops, parks & transit. Donâ€™t miss out!
